name: EA Sports FC 26
desc: The next chapter in the World's Game. Experience HyperMotionV technology and authentic football gameplay.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
desc: Become a cyberpunk, an urban mercenary outlaw equipped with cybernetic enhancements and build your legend on the streets of Night City.

name: Call of Duty: BO7
desc: Dive into a gritty, cinematic campaign and the next generation of Multiplayer and Zombie modes.

name: Spider-Man 2
desc: Swing through Marvel’s New York as Peter Parker and Miles Morales in this epic sequel to the critically acclaimed franchise.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
desc: Explore the stunning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in the ultimate open-world experience.

name: Spider-Man Remastered
desc: Play as an experienced Peter Parker fighting big crime in Marvel's New York with updated graphics and immersive haptic feedback.

name: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
desc: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents.

name: Elden Ring
desc: Journey through the Lands Between and claim the power of the Elden Ring to become an Elden Lord.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
desc: A grand tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland during the dawn of the modern age.

name: God of War Ragnarok
desc: Embark on an epic and heartfelt journey as Kratos and Atreus struggle with holding on and letting go.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
desc: Set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend.

name: Helldivers 2
desc: Join the Helldivers and fight for freedom with friends across a hostile galaxy in this fast, frantic third-person shooter.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
desc: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
desc: You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. Hunt down the child of prophecy in a war-torn open world.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
desc: Live the unwritten. Your journey to Hogwarts in the 1800s wizarding world begins now.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
desc: The Unknown Journey Continues. Cloud and his friends escape Midgar in pursuit of the fallen hero, Sephiroth.

name: Resident Evil 4 Remake
desc: Survival is just the beginning. Leon S. Kennedy tracks the President's kidnapped daughter to a secluded European village.

name: The Last of Us Part I
desc: Endure and survive. Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters in the game that started it all.

name: Tekken 8
desc: Fist meets Fate. The longest-running video game storyline continues with state-of-the-art graphics and powerful new rivalries.

name: Street Fighter 6
desc: Hit the streets with new ways to play and fight in the next evolution of Capcom's legendary fighting series.

name: The Last of Us Part II
desc: Confront the devastating physical and emotional consequences of Ellie's actions in this gripping sequel.

name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
desc: Stand against the darkness. Cal Kestis' story continues in this third-person galaxy-spanning adventure.

name: Minecraft: Java & Bedrock
desc: Create, explore, survive. Build anything you can imagine with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode.

name: Palworld
desc: Fight, farm, build and work alongside mysterious creatures called Pals in this completely new multiplayer open-world survival crafting game.

name: KakiPhone 15 Pro
desc: The ultimate gaming phone. Titanium finish. 144Hz OLED. Zero Lagging.

name: KakiWatch Ultra
desc: Rugged. Capable. Built for the wild. Your HUD in real life.

name: KakiPad Air
desc: Serious performance. Thin design. Bigger screen, better headshots.
